::Astroblast:: 
Astroblast is rocked by the initial blast, but manages to stablize 
himself, but thinks, 'Beastbox won't like that.' He sees Prowl and 
Iron Hide approching from underneath and says, "Damn," Menasor, 
drop the bot, disband, and lets get out of here!" He starts flying up 
the African west coast.


On 27 Feb 2001, at 23:50, airly2000@... wrote:

> OOC: I'll do other thing, just see
> 
> Khonkolor:
> 
> "OHHHHH NOOOOO" shouted angered Khonkolor, he took a granade laucher, 
> with it the granade could be reach over 700 feet up,  "Now Guy, 
> You're OUT!!!!"
> 
> He shot the granade to Astroblast it was arriving until Astroblast 
> was while the count down ended. 3... 2... 1... 0 BOOOM!!!
> 
> Ganade exploded near Astroblast.
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > OOC: no offence, but i'm not sure that Khonkolor can through a 
> > grenade maybe 700+ feet straight up. =P If he can, I'll repost.
> > 
> > ::Astroblast::
> > Astroblast watches as the grenade comes up and explodes some 
> > distance below him, a piece of sharpnel tings off of his armour.
> > 
> > On 27 Feb 2001, at 6:51, airly2000@y... wrote:
> > 
> > > Khonkolor::
> > > 
> > > "Well" thought the young bot "If one thing no works... Then use 
> other 
> > > strategy..."
> > > He showed a granade, this granade could stick to every metal 
> surface  
> > > and i do a big destruction. Khonkolor lauched the granade towards 
> > > Astroblast and it sticks to his back. The counddown started 5... 
> 4... 
> > > 3... 2... 1.. BOOOOOOOOM!!!!!!!! 
> > > 
> > > --- In nbwrg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > > ::Astroblast::
> > > > Astroblast notices the bot firing from way below (he is quite 
> > > high), 
> > > > and laughs as several bullets dent his armour plating. He 
> ignores 
> > > > the bot, "He'll run out of ammunition before he'll ever be able 
> to 
> > > take 
> > > > me down from up here." Astroblast fires three laser blasts from 
> his 
> > > > twin lasers at the CF.
> > > > 
> > > > On 27 Feb 2001, at 6:15, airly2000@y... wrote:
> > > > 
> > > > > Khonkolor:
> > > > > 
> > > > > "This is mine!!!!"thought the young bot. He took his machine 
> gun 
> > > and 
> > > > > shot 25 shots against Astroblast.
> > > > > 
> > > > > 
> > > > > --- In nbwrpg@y..., "rAuq" <rauq@t...> wrote:
> > > > > > ::Astroblast::
> > > > > > Over his comm-link, high above the CF, Astroblast commands 
> > > > > > Menasor, "MENASOR, DISBAND AND RETREAT, WE ARE OUT 
> > > > > > MANNED AND OUT GUNNED." As he monitors the actions below.
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > On 27 Feb 2001, at 0:27, Jen D. wrote:
> > > > > > 
> > > > > > > (hey! no one responded to the shots fired by the Element!:
> ( )
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Different shots heading for the electors hit the shields 
> of 
> > > the 
> > > > > Element, all 
> > > > > > > being destroyed. Looking around the battle, Mantle saw 
> the 
> > > other 
> > > > > Maximals 
> > > > > > > fighting. From the look of their base, things weren't 
> good. 
> > > He 
> > > > > looked down 
> > > > > > > at his team, sending a message to their minds:
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > "You guys go ahead, I'll battle from here." He looks up 
> in 
> > > time 
> > > > > to see a big 
> > > > > > > robot reaching for something that looked like a bunch of 
> > > metal. 
> > > > > His mind 
> > > > > > > probed out, seeing that it was a robot. Mantle was a bit 
> > > > > surprised at all 
> > > > > > > the rage that he could feel around him, as well as the 
> pain 
> > > and 
> > > > > suffering, 
> > > > > > > but he was used to it by now. On his first several 
> battles it 
> > > > > surprised him, 
> > > > > > > though, and made him a bit less good of a leader untill 
> he 
> > > got 
> > > > > used to it. 
> > > > > > > But he was used to it now, and no one was going to push 
> the 
> > > > > Maximals around 
> > > > > > > while he was on this planet!
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Mantle concentrated hard, making his mind reach out 
> across 
> > > the 
> > > > > battlefield. 
> > > > > > > He flexed his mind and Firearm's body rose from the 
> shields, 
> > > > > avoiding 
> > > > > > > Menasor's grab. Mantle slowly lowered to the ground, his 
> > > teeth 
> > > > > clenched. One 
> > > > > > > of the setbacks of his ability to use his mind to 
> directly 
> > > > > influence robots 
> > > > > > > was that it created a temporary link between those robots 
> and 
> > > > > himself. In 
> > > > > > > this case, Mantle could feel the pain that Firearm was 
> > > feeling, 
> > > > > and it was 
> > > > > > > almost too much. But he held on, flipping Firearm through 
> the 
> > > air 
> > > > > with his 
> > > > > > > mind. Sweat poured down his forehead as he made Firearm's 
> > > body 
> > > > > quickly fly 
> > > > > > > through the air toward the Element.
> > > > > > > 
> > > > > > > Through nearly closed eyes, Mantle could see the rest of 
> his 
> > > team 
> > > > > emerging 
> > > > > > > from the shield, still firing. He saw that Cinder was 
> looking 
> > > > > through the 
> > > > > > > battle, searching for the bot she had been worrying about 
> as 
> > > she 
> > > > > fired more 
> > > > > > > at Deamon Wulf. His eyes drifted to the rest of his 
> family, 
> > > > > seeing Rocky 
> > > > > > > fire two more missiles at Dark Claw. Aqua nearly tripped 
> over 
> > > the 
> > > > > uneven 
> > > > > > > ground, causing one of his spears to dig into the earth, 
> but 
> > > the 
> > > > > next three 
> > > > > > > were aimed exactly at Flesh Ripper's head. Above him, 
> Mist 
> > > gained 
> > > > > altitude, 
> > > > > > > firing charges at Menasor's hand.
> > > > > > >
